body_html:
@danielwatson6 Hi, what do you think about the second solution I wrote above? I mean:

dataset.apply(sliding_window_batch(window_size=3, stride=1))
        .batch(batch_size)
        .map(lambda x: tf.transpose(x))

I would prefer to improve codes only if it's necessary, however I agree with @mrry that contributions (to loosen the restriction) are welcome.

body:
@danielwatson6 Hi, what do you think about the second solution I wrote above? I mean:

```python
dataset.apply(sliding_window_batch(window_size=3, stride=1))
        .batch(batch_size)
        .map(lambda x: tf.transpose(x))
```

I would prefer to improve codes only if it's necessary, however I agree with @mrry that contributions (to loosen the restriction) are welcome.
